review: Great device, especially if you are an Amazon Prime member.  Set up took maybe 8 minutes (even with the Fire Stick video).  Once shipped, it took less than 2 days to get here.  Everything you store in the Amazon cloud is basically accessible on this device (photos, movies, music, etc).  I probably will not play games using this device (not a gamer), but I do enjoy access to YouTube once again on my TV (which I cannot get on my Roku).  The $20 introductory price was also a great bonus.
author: E. Vincent

review: Just got mine yesterday and plugged it in right away. The setup was super easy and intuitive although the updated software took a long time to download. The weirdest thing was how hard it was to get the battery cover off to install the batteries the first time. It took me and my husband several tries to finally get it to pry loose - we were worried it was going to break. It has a little click every time you make a selection on the remote - I find it kind of oddly cute, but it might get on some peoples nerves.It would be nice if it had a light on the remote or the stick itself to show that it was actually turned on too. Other than that, it is a super simple way to do what it does. Nice sleek remote and little fuss to use.
author: S. High

review: The device constantly loses my wireless connection. The only trouble shooting it has suggests making sure the stick is not in a cabinet-it is not. It is in an open area 15 feet from my router. I've had it about a week, almost constant problems.
